info.title: StorageMoverClient
info.description: The Azure Storage Mover REST API.

AadOauth2Auth.description: The Azure Active Directory OAuth2 Flow

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists all Storage Movers in a subscription.
Lists all Storage Movers in a resource group.

parameters.name: storageMoverName
parameters.description: The name of the Storage Mover resource.

put.description: Creates or updates a top-level Storage Mover resource.

patch.description: Updates properties for a Storage Mover resource. Properties not specified in the request body will be unchanged.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

AgentListResult.description: The response of a Agent list operation.

value.description: The Agent items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

arcResourceId.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the Hybrid Compute resource for the Agent.

arcVmUuid.description: The VM UUID of the Hybrid Compute resource for the Agent.

lastStatusUpdate.description: The last updated time of the Agent status.

localIPAddress.description: Local IP address reported by the Agent.

memoryInMB.description: Available memory reported by the Agent, in MB.

numberOfCores.description: Available compute cores reported by the Agent.

uptimeInSeconds.description: Uptime of the Agent in seconds.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

message.description: Expanded description of reported error code

AzureKeyVaultSmbCredentials.description: The Azure Key Vault secret URIs which store the credentials.

usernameUri.description: The Azure Key Vault secret URI which stores the username. Use empty string to clean-up existing value.

passwordUri.description: The Azure Key Vault secret URI which stores the password. Use empty string to clean-up existing value.

AzureStorageBlobContainerEndpointPropert.description: The properties of Azure Storage blob container endpoint.

storageAccountResourceId.description: The Azure Resource ID of the storage account that is the target destination.

blobContainerName.description: The name of the Storage blob container that is the target destination.

AzureStorageSmbFileShareEndpointProperti.description: The properties of Azure Storage SMB file share endpoint.

storageAccountResourceId.description: The Azure Resource ID of the storage account.

fileShareName.description: The name of the Azure Storage file share.

AzureStorageSmbFileShareEndpointUpdatePr.description: The properties of Azure Storage SMB file share endpoint to update.

Endpoint.description: The Endpoint resource, which contains information about file sources and targets.

properties.description: The resource specific properties for the Storage Mover resource.

EndpointBaseProperties.description: The resource specific properties for the Storage Mover resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

properties.description: The Endpoint resource, which contains information about file sources and targets.

EndpointBaseUpdateProperties.description: The Endpoint resource, which contains information about file sources and targets.

EndpointListResult.description: The response of a Endpoint list operation.

value.description: The Endpoint items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

JobDefinitionListResult.description: The response of a JobDefinition list operation.

value.description: The JobDefinition items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

description.description: A description for the Job Definition.

sourceName.description: The name of the source Endpoint.

sourceResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource ID of the source Endpoint.

sourceSubpath.description: The subpath to use when reading from the source Endpoint.

targetName.description: The name of the target Endpoint.

targetResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource ID of the target Endpoint.

targetSubpath.description: The subpath to use when writing to the target Endpoint.

latestJobRunName.description: The name of the Job Run in a non-terminal state, if exists.

latestJobRunResourceId.description: The fully qualified resource ID of the Job Run in a non-terminal state, if exists.

latestJobRunStatus.description: The current status of the Job Run in a non-terminal state, if exists.

agentName.description: Name of the Agent to assign for new Job Runs of this Job Definition.

agentResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource id of the Agent to assign for new Job Runs of this Job Definition.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

description.description: A description for the Job Definition.

agentName.description: Name of the Agent to assign for new Job Runs of this Job Definition.

code.description: Error code of the given entry.

message.description: Error message of the given entry.

target.description: Target of the given error entry.

JobRunListResult.description: The response of a JobRun list operation.

value.description: The JobRun items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

status.description: The state of the job execution.

scanStatus.description: The status of Agent's scanning of source.

agentName.description: Name of the Agent assigned to this run.

agentResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource id of the Agent assigned to this run.

executionStartTime.description: Start time of the run. Null if no Agent reported that the job has started.

executionEndTime.description: End time of the run. Null if Agent has not reported that the job has ended.

lastStatusUpdate.description: The last updated time of the Job Run.

itemsScanned.description: Number of items scanned so far in source.

itemsExcluded.description: Number of items that will not be transferred, as they are excluded by user configuration.

itemsUnsupported.description: Number of items that will not be transferred, as they are unsupported on target.

itemsNoTransferNeeded.description: Number of items that will not be transferred, as they are already found on target (e.g. mirror mode).

itemsFailed.description: Number of items that were attempted to transfer and failed.

itemsTransferred.description: Number of items successfully transferred to target.

bytesScanned.description: Bytes of data scanned so far in source.

bytesExcluded.description: Bytes of data that will not be transferred, as they are excluded by user configuration.

bytesUnsupported.description: Bytes of data that will not be transferred, as they are unsupported on target.

bytesNoTransferNeeded.description: Bytes of data that will not be transferred, as they are already found on target (e.g. mirror mode).

bytesFailed.description: Bytes of data that were attempted to transfer and failed.

bytesTransferred.description: Bytes of data successfully transferred to target.

sourceName.description: Name of source Endpoint resource. This resource may no longer exist.

sourceResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource id of source Endpoint. This id may no longer exist.

sourceProperties.description: Copy of source Endpoint resource's properties at time of Job Run creation.

targetName.description: Name of target Endpoint resource. This resource may no longer exist.

targetResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource id of of Endpoint. This id may no longer exist.

targetProperties.description: Copy of Endpoint resource's properties at time of Job Run creation.

jobDefinitionProperties.description: Copy of parent Job Definition's properties at time of Job Run creation.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

JobRunResourceId.description: Response that identifies a Job Run.

jobRunResourceId.description: Fully qualified resource id of the Job Run.

JobRunScanStatus.description: The status of Agent's scanning of source.

JobRunStatus.description: The current status of the Job Run in a non-terminal state, if exists.

NfsMountEndpointProperties.description: The properties of NFS share endpoint.

host.description: The host name or IP address of the server exporting the file system.

export.description: The directory being exported from the server.

ProjectListResult.description: The response of a Project list operation.

value.description: The Project items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

ProvisioningState.description: The provisioning state of this resource.

Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

SmbMountEndpointProperties.description: The properties of SMB share endpoint.

host.description: The host name or IP address of the server exporting the file system.

shareName.description: The name of the SMB share being exported from the server.

credentials.description: The Azure Key Vault secret URIs which store the required credentials to access the SMB share.

SmbMountEndpointUpdateProperties.description: The properties of SMB share endpoint to update.

credentials.description: The Azure Key Vault secret URIs which store the required credentials to access the SMB share.

value.description: The StorageMover items on this page
